lead_paragraph: Jacksonville addressed its biggest need, agreeing to a three-year contract with the veteran receiver Torry Holt. The deal lessens the need for the Jaguars to get a receiver early in this weekend’s draft and gives the franchise its biggest weapon at the position since Jimmy Smith retired in 2006.
